item.title: China Cracks Down on Surge in AI-Driven Fraud
item.description: How to Protect Yourself from AI-Driven Fraud In recent years, there has been a surge in AI-driven fraud. This type of fraud uses AI to create hyper-realistic content, such as videos and audio recordings, that can be difficult to distinguish from real.
